Minecraft-Heads.comÂ¶

  • Minecraft-Heads.com Categories
    • Usage ingame
    • Configuring in the config.yml

The author of PetBlocks is in a official partnership with the owner of https://minecraft-heads.com.

This means the site collects and sponsors lots of skins available per default in PetBlocks.

Warning

Please notice that users receive an advertisement message when selecting a sponsored skin. This is intended and cannot be changed by any configuration option in PetBlocks. If you do not like the advertisement message you can simply remove any part of minecraft-heads.com from PetBlocks. However, this is not recommend as many great skins get lost.

Note

There is no way to remove the advertisement message even donations are not accepted. Take a look into the category creation section in order to build categories from minecraft-heads.com by your self without advertisement messages.
